494270.name: Battle Girls - Soundtrack
494270.description:
The complete 25 track Battle Girls original Soundtrack, created by Sam L. Jones.

  • 1. Main Theme
  • 2. Battle Theme 1
  • 3. Battle Theme 2
  • 4. Sad Theme 1
  • 5. Winner's Theme
  • 6. Loser's Theme
  • 7. Happy Theme 1
  • 8. Happy Theme 2
  • 9. Time for Romance 1
  • 10. Time for Romance 2
  • 11. Mecha World 1
  • 12. Mech World 2
  • 13. Joyful Times 1
  • 14. Joyful Times 2
  • 15. Joyful Times 3
  • 16. Quirky 1
  • 17. Another Day 1
  • 18. Another Day 2
  • 19. Relaxing Days Come Round
  • 20. Kinky 1
  • 21. Sensual
  • 22. Blissful Love
  • 23. Calm Loving
  • 24. Last Happy Days
  • 25. Ending Music Calm
